Title: Sad Face
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Graham Falk, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: John DiMaggio, Brett Gelman, Tom Kenny, Andy Milonakis
Plot: Once a month, while Finn and Jake are asleep, Jake's tail comes to life. It travels to a little circus in the forest, where it is known as Blue Nose the sad faced clown. But Blue Nose and ...
